mapper.select: select *, format(totalprice, 0) fmtsum, date_format(right(orderid, 8), '%Y. %m. %d') fmtdate, case when(status = 0) then '결제확인중' when(status = 1) then '결제완료' when(status = 2) then '배송준비중' when(status = 3) then '배송중' when(status = 4) then '배송완료' end as str_status from purchase where userid = #{userid} order by purchaseid desc limit #{start}, #{size}
select count(*) from purchase where userid = #{userid}

select pd.*, p.name, format(p.price, 0) product_price, p.content, i.imageid, i.image_name, i.image_url from product p, purchase_detail pd, image i where p.productid = pd.productid and pd.productid = i.productid and pd.purchaseid = #{purchaseid} and p.name like concat('%', #{query}, '%') order by pd.purchasedetailid desc
